data.comment: The match is underway at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Mats Seuntjens for Sittard has been booked by Marc Nagtegaal and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 15, Finn Stokkers puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Cyril Ngonge.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Lazaros Rota equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 45, Sebastian Polter with an assist there.
Waalwijk's Kostas Lamprou has been booked in Sittard-Geleen.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sjors Ultee (Sittard) is making a first substitution, with Emil Hansson replacing Mats Seuntjens.
Roel Janssen (Sittard) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 65, Fred Grim is making the team's first substitution at Fortuna Sittard Stadion with Ayman Azhil replacing Cyril Ngonge.
Vitalie Damascan is replacing Finn Stokkers for Waalwijk at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
The away team have replaced Lennerd Daneels with Sylla Sow. This is the third substitution made today by Fred Grim.
In the minute 82, Luuk Wouters is replacing Paul Quasten for Waalwijk at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Lars Nieuwpoort, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Hans Mulder is the substitute for Waalwijk.
Goal! Sittard have got their heads in front thanks to a Lisandro Semedo strike.
Lisandro Semedo (Sittard) has received a yellow card from Marc Nagtegaal.
